title: internet/network connection
content: INTERNET CONNECT TO FOR MY SAMSUNG GALAXY PHONE PLEASE HELP
creator: sallyannyeo

title: An empty page appears when you open the website.
content: Hello, sir or madam Thanks for taking the time to consider my request, The website is blank when you first visit it. To access it, visit how much does an indoor basketball court cost Nothing is displayed on the page. Is there a problem loading the website in Brave?
creator: alvisinwalex678

title: Sites not working
content:
I am having trouble with sites: shoprite.com, citibank/card.com, pnc.com and others. They are not executing some command when I am online but I go to Google Chrome and they work. When it does not respond to a I have cleared data many times but it does not seem to help.

What is the solution? I have used Firefox for many many years without major issues like this. I do not want to use any other browser but if I cannot get consistency I will be forced to.
creator: gerald.tiano

title: acquisti ebay
content: Il mio problema è questo: non riesco a fare le offerte nelle inserzioni su ebay. Quando clicco il bottone per fare un'offerta va in tilt il riquadro e continua a girare il cerchiolino e devo per forza cliccare la crocetta in alto a sinistra per uscire e tornare all'inserzione. Penso che sia un problema di driver della scheda video oppure ho molti virus nel sistema operativo. Ho provato a cambiare scheda video e leggermente cambia la grafica nelle inserzioni ma il problema di fare le offerte su ebay rimane. Un grazie anticipato.
creator: zanmic

title: Since yesterday symbols in the overhang menu are centered in the middle instead of being placed on the left as before
content: Hello, how can I rearrange the icons in the overhang menu to the left? Since yesterday the icons are centered in the middle of the overhang menu. If you make the Firefox window smaller now, the icons on the right are no longer displayed. I am using version 110 on a Windows 7 system. Thanks a lot for the help.
creator: MasterBlaster69

title: Using the Listen function in Reader View - Change audio output
content: I use the listen function to convert text to speech, but it comes out of my system speakers even if my default speaker is my headphones. How can I change where the audio is output in Firefox?
creator: wesley83

title: Outlook.com email service
content: Outlook.com email service has stopped responding to clicks on "Inbox". First attempt opens the Inbox, all other clicks to go back to the "Inbox" do not work. The only way to go back to the "Inbox" is to use the back arrow in the browser, or click on "Sent"(or another file)...then click on "Inbox". The cycle continues. Been like this since I updated to 110.0.1 (64bit)
creator: sandhilllv1

title: Firefox opens home page as well as link
content:
A few versions ago, Firefox (Mac) changed behavior when clicking on a link in an outside program. Specifically, if Firefox is not running and I click a link in Outlook, Firefox opens the clicked link in a tab but also opens my homepage in a second tab. Since I'm only interested in the clicked link at this time I don't want it to open my home page, just the clicked link. This problem is exacerbated by my.yahoo.com which causes a switch from the tab containing the clicked link to the homepage tab.

How do I get Firefox to only open the link that I clicked and not my homepage in addition? This was the normal behavior until a few months ago.

Mac OS 11.7.4 Firefox 110.0.1

Thank you!
creator: furst569

title: Update on/about 21 April 2021 caused crash on quit
content:
I am using Mac OS x 10.15. The FireFox Update on/about 21 April 2021 caused crash on quit. I have read the two pages of Widevine plugin issues, but I do not use FireFox for viewing videos. I have no Widevine or similar plugin. Every time since the 4/21 update, when I click "Quit FireFox" It goes into a slow routine, then a pop-up asks if I want to report the crash. I have shared the data requested when I get the crash pop-up. I have used FireFox since v.3.? when it came out way back when. Obviously I liked it better when I did not have delay and crash to quit the browser.

This went on for about two years and was fixed about a week ago (Thank you!!!), now broken again with 110.0.1.

Please, any reason not to roll back to the previous version and have a smooth shutdown again?
creator: 2much

title: facebook messanger
content: face book messenger work in other search engine but does not work using Firefox. its blank

title: Short cut Icon
content: My shortcut Icon is gone. Please give this senior citizen a step by step instruction on how to get it back on my desktop computer.
creator: kathywhob

title: Disable Ctrl + Shift + C shortcut
content:
I really often need to copy/paste from a terminal opened in my browser. Because the shortcut for copying in a terminal is always Ctrl+Shift+C, it's a mess to have instead Firefox opening Inspector from devtools.

How can I disable this shortcut ?

I've tried to update some about:config settings but it doesn't seem to be helpful and old working correctives add-ons are not supported anymore.
creator: alexandre.huet7

title: Keyboard not working properly at times ??   Chime instead of letter ?
content:
I am not sure exactly when this started happening but I would say in the last few weeks ? When I go to type a reply to something on the internet I get a "chime" instead of the letter. It seems to only happen on the first letter of a sentence. For example when I went to type this question I hit the "shift" key and the "I" and all I got was a chime sound. I did it again and got my "I" and it has been fine while typing all of this question.

I have tried a different keyboard here on my desktop and I am also having the problem on my laptop at home. So I dont think it is a hardware issue. Also, it only seems to happen when using Firefox. I can use Microsoft Word and other software and it never happens.

Anyone else have this problem ? I asked on one of the internet forums I use and two other users are having the same problem.

Firefox is up to date.

Thanks :) Bill
creator: enginerepairshop

title: After Firefox update failure unable to run all browsers
content:
Firefox tried to update and this failed, Although I can still receive emails I cannot access any other app. Also neither Edge or google now work, I can connect to the internet on other devices so router ok. I tried to restore but not turned on so cannot go back. Any ideas as the pc was working ok before update, slightly strange as a window just appeared saying update in progress.

Update Firefox 110.0.1 (20230227191043) Installed on 3 March 2023 at 09:51:13 Status The update could be installed (patch apply failed)
creator: pete.binnie

title: Recent update - loading issue
content:
I had an old problem with Firefox that has returned, probably because of a new update some months back.

When I click on the icon to open the web, there is a very bright white screen for a mili-second or two. It is painful to my old eyes and retinas! Then it jumps into the dark mode screen that I need and prefer.

This happened once before, but eventually an update seemed to have ended the bright white pop-flash screen. Alas, it is back. I run a Lenovo M900, Win10Pro OS and "blessed Mozilla" keeps my Firefox browser up-to-date.

Best, Scott in Columbus, Ohio
creator: scott.williams99

title: Brez zvoka
content: Po včerajšnji posodobitvi ni več zvoka na nobeni strani, ki jo odprem. Vse ostalo deluje normalno.
creator: simona.kolar

title: The Firefox browser causes my bank's website to log me out.
content: I have been having trouble after logging in to my bank's website. They use a security feature that logs me out after 15 minutes of inactivity, which is great. About two months ago or longer, after logging in, it would log me out after 10 seconds. Sometimes I can log in and stay logged in after repeated log-ins, but the problem gets worse, until often I cannot stay logged in for more than 10 seconds at a time, no matter how many times I try. I've worked with tech support at my bank, and they have never seen this problem before. They recommended clearing my cookies and cache, but that only seemed to help once. Anyway, I cannot see doing that every time I need to log in to my bank, since I do that several times a day. So, they recommended that I switch browsers. I tried Microsft Edge. Problem solved. I have no problem staying logged in using Edge. I prefer Firefox - I have been a loyal user for decades. Can you help me figure this out? - Terry Mulcahy, Albuquerque.
creator: tmulcahy1

title: Firefox saves to Download folder instead of asking where to save for Forced download link of files set to "Open in Firefox"
content:
My FF is set up to: - Always ask you where to save files - Open PDF in Firefox

On normal PDF links, FF opens the PDF normally without downloading (or after downloading it silently in a temporary location invisible to me). On "Force Download" links, FF downloads the PDF to the Download folder without asking where to save it. This is for example the case when clicking "Download" on a file in Gmail. If I click "Download" in Gmail on another file type that I have not set to "Open in Firefox", FF does ask me where to save it.

My expectation would be that, if the file cannot be opened in the browser, then FF would revert to the user's chosen behavior of "Always ask you where to save files".
creator: leilujp

title: CAPTCHA and lag
content: I am somewhat new and ready to leave. Firefox help is very disappointing. That said, does anyone have a clue why the Firefox browser takes literally minutes to execute a search and most times I do search it goes straight a google captcha that I have to do 5-6 times to proceed. I do have a vpn but it is routed through the US. Also, zero problems with Chrome, Edge, and Brave. I am assuming it's a setting or is Firefox just trash?
creator: thoralaska

our website is suddenly not displaying correctly in firefox but works fine on other browsers it is not a HTTPS issue

title: Firefox não abre
content: Após atualização automática o firefox não abre mais. Já desinstalei completamente e instalei novamente e o problema persiste, já apaguei do registro do PC e reinstalei e o problema persiste, já tentei criar novo usuário com o atalho windows +R e o comando firefox -p e o problema persiste. Já tentei de tudo, mas ele simplesmente não abre. É feito o atalho, ele aparece na barra de acesso, mas ao clicar nada acontece.
creator: douglasoa30

title: Barra dei segnalibri vuota
content: Buongiorno, con l'aggiornamento a Firefox 110.0.1 64 bit in due dei miei computer in cui gira Windows 10 sono spariti tutti i segnalibri che si trovavano nella barra, nelle rispettive cartelle. Ne compaiono solo un paio, gli ultimi aggiunti (prima dell'aggiornamento). Sono scomparsi anche nel cellulare Android. Non ho ancora provato nel pc in cui gira Windows 11, per il terrore che spariscano anche lì. C'è una soluzione al mio problema? L'utilizzo dei segnalibri per me è fondamentale, lì ci sono tutti i riferimanti che uso comunemente.
creator: alluseweb

title: I've used a website over 24,651 times, after this last update firefox is blocking it. It says "Connection Not Encrypted".  It used to give me a choice to continue, but now it wont let me access it. How do I get around this?

I've used a website over 24,651 times, after this last update Firefox is blocking it. It says "Connection Not Encrypted, The website does not support encryption for the page you are viewing". 

It used to give me the choice to continue, but now it wont let me access it. How do I get around this?

title: Tab not loading, need to open new tab
content:
I randomly get this issue, I enter URL and tab does nothing, even on F5, I open a new tab enter the same URL and it loads.

Maybe there are 10-15tabs open, CPU load is not high, plenty of RAM,

Very weird, like it wasn't even trying to do DNS query. As I remember I couldn't even open Network traffic log in tab, because page hasn't started loading yet.

title: impossibilità di accesso al mio sito bancario
content: Da quando il mio istituto di credito (CREDEM) ha modificato il suo internet banking (www.credemeuromobiliarepb.it) non riesco più ad accedervi con firefox. Alla richiesta, inserisco il mio codice utente e password ma purtoppo ritorno sempre nella stessa pagina che mi chiede i dati di accesso. Preciso che non ho problemi di accesso con altri browser (Microsoft Edge e Google Chrome) né con l'apposita applicazione scaricata sul mio cellulare. Grazie per l'aiuto
creator: fortunato.amodeo

title: Massive blank space to left of bookmarks toolbar:  How do I remove this?
content: So at some point today, my bookmarks toolbar changed. nothing is missing. it just now has a massive blank space to the side that I cannot remove. Does anyone know how to fix this? See attached image for what I'm talking about. nothing I try removes that huge gap to the left.
creator: CCCM89

title: When using google or other google products (like youtube) There are 2000ms ping spikes affecting all devices on the network.
content:
Two updates ago, I had an issue where if I used any Google web products, I had weird network problems that just didn't go away (4000ms ping spikes every 5 packets). I noticed it was only when I was using Firefox, so i tried disabling add-ons and extensions, it still happened. I opened it in safe mode, it still happened. I tried using Chrome and Edge, both did not cause issues.

I reset my Firefox completely (There was some custom CSS to put tabs on bottom, where they belong) and it was perfectly fine! No issues! Everything was great for a few days!

Then you guys updated things again... and it was back... so I reset my Firefox again, and even straight out of the box, its still causing the issue, but now only when using google products, with or without add-ons, there is no custom CSS anymore either.

I do not know why its an issue, but it is, and it is ONLY with Firefox, and I really do not want to switch to Chrome or Edge... It also persists after Google is closed, until I restart Firefox.

I am unsure of specifically why this is happening now, but it is a MAJOR problem for me
creator: Kirstenly

title: Very slow
content:
Hi.

Firefox is very slow. If i do the same browsing, in Chrome, there is no problems.

Reinstall Firefox, and all the guides, is tested - no luck.

I really love Firefox, and have used it, for many years, but this slow experience - that will scare me away.

Brgds Henrik

title: Microsoft OneDrive or Outlook doesnt load
content: Quite a number of times I am unable to get oneDrive or MS Outlook to load in Firefox. It comes up quickly on Edge browser. i have to remove cookies for Live.com then close and restart Firefox to get them to load.

title: Moving Firefox data to a new computer
content:
My old computer is running Windows 8.1. My newer computer is running Windows 10. I have tried five different sets of instructions for moving all my bookmarks, saved logins, current tabs, etc. from the old to the newer using a memory stick, and none of them has worked.

Do the Windows versions have to be the same? Do the Firefox versions have to match?

Is there a site that tells how to do this?
creator: Kulindahr

title: Can't Figure out how to downgrade Firefox
content: Firefox v. 110.0.1 is practically unusable on my (very old) OS, so I need to downgrade to the version immediately previous to this one. However, on the file pages, I can't figure out which file to download. I'm looking for a Win 32 file.
creator: FireFoxFan1

title: mac ventura 'move window to left of screen' and 'move window to right of screen' not working with keyboard shortcut
content:
mac ventura 'move window to left of screen' and 'move window to right of screen' not working as expected with keyboard shortcut, however it is working as expected from menu bar. I reached Apple for support, they asked me to reach firefox team to get it fixed as it is app specific.

Definition of not working as expected: when I apply keyboard shortcut for move to left(if the window is in the right side) it move completely to the right as expected but it jump back to left side(not exactly left side) slightly moved towards right; same behavior is same when we use keyboard shortcut for move to right. whether we use move right or left using keyboard shortcut; position of the window always remain somewhere in the middle; screenshot attached

Keyboard shortcuts I assigned: move window to left of screen: ctrl+option+left arrow move window to right of screen: ctrl + option + right arrow

Same assigned keyboard shortcuts are working for rest of all the apps in my mac Please note: everything is working as expected using menu bar
creator: LightBulb

title: unlock Origin Breaking YouTube
content:
This has just started today. If I disable Ublock origin the problem goes away.

Thanks.
creator: ThankYou88

title: Sync data not showing up
content:
Hi, I recently needed to wipe my drive and reinstall my windows install. Since i was connected to a Firefox account and enabled sync i thought that all my extensions and bookmarks would show up when i logged back in on my newly reset computer. But problem is that i just logged in and nothing is sync, i lost everything! Is there any way to get it back somehow or is everything lost?

Thank you!
creator: kijet

title: Error message Authentication failed  for incoming mail after update 102.8.0
content:
Secure Connection Failed! It is continuously checking mail server capability. I have an authentication problem with Thunderbird since the update yesterday 102.8.0. It was working fine before that, but now I can't receive emails, but I can send them.

Secure connection failed The document contains no data.The page you are trying to view can not be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified. 

   I have checked the IMAP with my protonmail and it is correct - nothing has changed there.    I have gone into my Virus protection and cleared the caches etc.    I have gone into tools and cleared recent history.    i have read through rheems of articles and suggestions on the Mozilla page - but cant fix this problem.

The last email I received was from a regular friend - but an error message came up suggesting that their email/server could not be verified - I clicked to make an exception. I don't know how to get back to this place to undo this exception - in case this is the problem.
creator: eastonchandra

title: Nest camera not accessible
content: Previous to the last update I was able to use Firefox to access the Nest camera, now not. It's ok using MS Edge. I keep having to enter my gmail & password over & over yet never connects.
creator: samcclare

title: what?
content: recently installed bitdefender and it keeps reporting "firefox.exe attempted to establish a connection relying on an expired certificate to base9-hx.diltwo.com. We blocked the connection to keep your data safe since websites must renew their certificates with a certification authority to stay current, and outdated security certificates represent a risk." it then asks if i want to add to exceptions. please explain. thanks
creator: meweslow

title: Issue with Google Mail site
content:
So I just cleared my cookies and Cache for my web browswer since Youtube looked like it was having some kind of issue, and when I went to go sign into my email, I got a very odd message. I signed in as usual, but I got a 400 error message, saying the server can't process the request because it's malformed. I have no idea what's going on here. I'm using version 110.0.1 of Firefox. Just updated earlier yesterday and up till fifteen minutes ago, everything was working fine. What happened?!

I'm including a screenshot of what I'm seeing. Please help!


Edit: I managed to figure it out. Somehow Gstatic was blocked on Noscript. Sorry for the confusion!
creator: Marc7

title: Historico, marcadores, favoritos e palavras passe
content:
Boa noite, gostava de tirar uma duvida. Eu formatei meu computador e vendi pois comprei um novo. Ao instalar o firefox no meu novo macbook, fiz login com minha conta do firefox, porem nao tem nada das minhas informacoes e dados do meu perfil do computador antigo. Ou seja, sumiu todo o historico, marcadores e palavras passe.

Como faço para recupera-los?

Ja fiz esse procedimento ano passado quando formatei o computador, porem desta vez nao aparece nada.

Na foto tem apenas as 2 credenciais que fiz login agora no computador novo.

Obrigada.
creator: franiahoffmann

title: Shorter/slower tab scrolling distance.
content:
The scrolling of tabs from left to right using the mouse wheel is way faster than I want. One scroll of the mouse wheel moves the tabs like 80% of the way across the tab-bar. This is problematic when the browser window is sharing half the screen and a scroll moves all visible tabs away. This means I have to then click the buttons to move the tabs one-at-a-time and if I click too fast it scrolls an entire pages worth which is also unwanted.

TLDR: I want a setting like `mousewheel.default.delta_multiplier_y` that only works in the tab-bar.
creator: siph

title: "Open Link in New Tab" auto closes tab immediatly when in Private Browsing Mode
content: If I open a private window and then right click on any link and choose the "Open Link in New Tab" context menu option, a new tab will appear for a few milliseconds before immediately closing and the link will never load. The new tab closed in this manner will not show up in the history of closed tabs either (likely because this list is only updated after a tab fully loads a page before being closed, which obviously never happens). I have not added any new addons since long before this problem started, but I did try disabling any tab related addons to no effect.
creator: 700_Tnega_Terces

title: Freezing issue while playing videos
content:
In this current update 110 and so on, I am facing issue of freezing and very high cpu and memory consumption. It happens when I play multiple videos in different tabs. The problems starts when I uses video pop up option and adds 4-5 videos on the screen. I reformatted the windows but problem still persist.

my details: Windows 11 22 H2 CPU is I7 8th generation and 8 GB RAM. Website is Youtube, IPTV Websites and online TV Channel website like Photocall.tv
creator: win.ent
